question.content: What does Edie want to do?
question.choice: He wants to go to the clown school.
He wants to go to the cinema.
He wants to see a clown.
He wants to make a clown.

question.content: What doesn't his mother do for him?
question.choice: She gives him a red nose.
She helps him put on the uniform and make his mouth bigger.
She paints a tear under one of his eyes.
